locale.name: tr_TR
locale.message: Ayarlar
Şifre
Lütfen bir şifre giriniz.
Kayıt
Kayıt Başarılı!
Güncelle
Veri İhracı
Belirli sayıları ihraç ediniz.
Sayıları Seçiniz
Belirli makaleleri ihraç ediniz
Makaleleri Seçiniz
Belirli dizgi ihracı
Dizgileri Seçiniz
HATA:
In order to use this plug-in please go to the "Public Identifier" plug-in category, enable and configure the DOI plug-in and specify a valid DOI prefix there.
The plug-in is not fully set up.
Click this button to register this object with the registration agency for the first time. This only works when you've never registered the object before!
Click this button to register or update the meta-data of the selected object(s) with the registration agency.
Registration was not successful! The DOI registration server returned an error: '{$param}'.
Registering many objects can take a long time. So please be patient after clicking the "Register" button. You'll be notified when registration is complete.
Direct registration is currently disabled. Please configure a username and password to be able to register objects directly with the registration agency.
Click this button to update the meta-data of this object with the registration agency. This only works if you successfully registered the object before!
Export all unregistered issues, articles and galleys
Select unregistered Issues, Articles and Galleys
All issues, articles and galleys have already been registered (or none of them has a DOI assigned).
No issues currently have DOIs assigned.
No articles currently have DOIs assigned.
No galleys currently have DOIs assigned.

Click this button to export XML data for the selected object(s) into a local file without registering it with the registration agency. This can be useful if you want a third party to register DOIs for you or if you want to inspect the XML format before registering it.
No issue matched the specified issue ID: {$param}.
No article matched the specified article ID: {$param}.
No galley matched the specified galley ID: {$param}.
The object with ID {$param} does not have a DOI assigned.
No journal matched the specified journal path: {$param}.
The object type {$param} cannot be exported.
The output file {$param} is not writable.
Successfully exported selected objects to '{$param}'
Kayıtlıları işaretle
Kayıtlı öğeleri işaretlemek için butunu tıklayınız (Ör.: daha önceden kayıtlı veya manuel kayıtlı)
Veri ihracı şu anda kullanılabilir değil. Lütfen eklenti gereksinimlerini kontrol ediniz.
Lütfen şifrenin düz metin olarak kaydedileceğini unutmayınız. Ör.: Şifreli değil (not encrypted).
